title: Frieza
skill:

When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
: Choose 1 《Frieza Clan》 card in your Battle Area and it gains for the duration of the turn.

title: Cooler
skill:
When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card.
When the power of one of your opponent's Battle Cards is decreased, your opponent places the top card of their deck in their Drop Area.
